Uses of Package
pulpcore.sound

Packages that use pulpcore.sound
pulpcore.animation Provides classes for properties, property animation, and timelines. 
pulpcore.animation.event Provides classes for timeline events. 
pulpcore.sound Provides classes for playing sound clips. 
 

Classes in pulpcore.sound used by pulpcore.animation
Sound
          The Sound class is a base class for sampled sound.
 

Classes in pulpcore.sound used by pulpcore.animation.event
Sound
          The Sound class is a base class for sampled sound.
 

Classes in pulpcore.sound used by pulpcore.sound
Playback
          The Playback class allows a Sound be modified while it is playing.
Sound
          The Sound class is a base class for sampled sound.
